verses.name: Numbers 13:22
verses.text: And they ascended by the south, and came unto Hebron; where Ahiman, Sheshai, and Talmai, the children of Anak, were. (Now Hebron was built seven years before Zoan in Egypt.)

verses.name: Numbers 13:23
verses.text: And they came unto the brook of Eshcol, and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes, and they bare it between two upon a staff; and they brought of the pomegranates, and of the figs.

verses.name: Numbers 13:24
verses.text: The place was called the brook Eshcol, because of the cluster of grapes which the children of Israel cut down from thence.
